methods.signature: _transform_expression(ex, indvars, depvars, dict_indvars, dict_depvars, dict_depvar_input, chain, eltypeθ, strategy, phi, derivative_, integral, initθ; is_integral, dict_transformation_vars, transformation_vars)

children: Transform the derivative expression to inner representation
First compute the derivative of function 'u(x,y)' with respect to x.
derivative(phi, u, [x, y], εs, order, θ)
, where phi - trial solution u - function x,y - coordinates of point εs - epsilon mask order - order of derivative θ - weight in neural network
